name: I Survived - AFFECTED ZONE
description:
The most addictive game!

iSurvived has found himself in an awful situation ... In the middle of nowhere, tonnes of Creatures, Zombies come to attack his town unexpectedly, Every one is killed included his family, he was a legend, he survives! one year later, when he comes back for revenge, he figures out that the creatures don't just murder his family, they overrun the affected town! Will he be able to survive through this Zombies Apocalypse? Show them who is the real Killer!

Time is against you, so be aware of that, kill everything on your way!
EARN LIVES BY KILLING.

You can customize your character to be more powerful in the zombie battlefield!

Join an exciting fantasy world.
